short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: While looking at product pages, MoneyVoters will inform you of the vendor's political affiliation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
STOP Donating Money to Causes you Don't Believe in! MoneyVoters shows you which political party your everyday spend is going too.

Corporations spend millions on political campaign contributions every year. Where is your money going? MoneyVoterss will show you. 

Save Time and Money Comparing prices and political parties from the website you are on!

Moneyvoters gives you the choice of the best stores to ensure your money goes to the causes you care about.

This free chrome extension allows you to make the choices everyday to vote with your money, and give to company's who support your beliefs. For more information visit us at: Moneyvoters.com
